name: GoingHome
description:
------Controls-------

Keyboard:

   Left: "A" 

   Right: "D"

   Jump: "Space"

   Block Place Mode: "S" (hold)

   Move Block: Arrow Keys

   Place Block: "Right Ctrl"

   Read: TBD

Controller (Xbox):

   Left/Right: Left Analog Stick

   Jump: "A"

   Block Place Mode: "LT" (hold)

   Move Block: Right Analog Stick

   Place Block: "B"

   Read: "Y"

GoingHome is about finding out where you belong, and who you belong with. You play as an alien, who has been thrown off their ship, but this isn’t the first time. You traverse levels and overcome obstacles to meet the alien population back at the ship, only to find yourself back at another planet alone..

Your only option is upwards. Don’t take too long.

(Yes.. I know the audio sounds awful- I will look into it)
